hero_title:
Taste of Hanoi
in the Heart of Saigon
hero_subtitle: The essence of Vietnamese cuisine in an ancient & luxurious space
story_desc_1: Located at 15E Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, District 1, Quan Nem brings a nostalgic space, reminiscent of the cultural beauty of old Hanoi.
story_desc_2: We are proud to serve the famous Crab Spring Rolls with crispy skin and fresh crab filling, along with Bun Cha rich in traditional flavor. Each dish is a work of art, prepared from the freshest ingredients.
menu_subtitle: Delicacies that made the Quan Nem brand
dish_nem_desc: Special square spring rolls, crispy skin, fresh sea crab filling.
dish_buncha_desc: Fragrant grilled pork, rich dipping sauce.
dish_nuocsau_desc: Cool sour taste, refreshing for summer days.
dish_tauhu_desc: Soft, smooth and good for your health.
book_desc: Please fill in the information for us to serve you best.
footer_desc: A place to preserve the soul of Vietnamese cuisine. Your satisfaction is our honor.
contact_address: 15E Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, Ben Nghe Ward, Dist 1, HCMC
